structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 2, effective April 23, 2002; and ch. 346, sec. 157, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 231, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998.

metadata.lrc-note: (4/23/2002). This section was amended by 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 343, sec. 2, and ch. 346, sec. 157, which appear to be in conflict. The changes made by ch. 346 are revisory in nature, while the changes made by ch. 343 are substantive. The changes of ch. 343 have been allowed to prevail. Cf. KRS 7.123.
